mapper.insert: insert into ExchangeTable (e_id, e_name, status, e_sort, e_remarks) values (#{eId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eRemarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ExchangeTable set status=#{status} where e_id=#{e_id}
update ExchangeTable set e_sort=#{e_sort} where e_id=#{e_id}
mapper.select: select e_id,e_name from ExchangeTable where status like concat('%',#{status},'%')
select e_id, e_name, status, e_sort, e_remarks from ExchangeTable
select * from ExchangeTable where status like concat('%',#{status},'%')
select * from ExchangeTable where e_name like concat('%',#{e_name},'%')
select count(*) from ExchangeTable where status like concat('%',#{status},'%')
